appendix.title: Supported monitors
appendix.para: The following monitors are supported by DDCcontrol:

sect2.title: Your monitor is not on this list?
sect2.para:
If your monitor is not on this list, and so doesn't work with DDCcontrol, but you think that it supports the DDC/CI protocol, please run this command:
LANG= LC_ALL= ddccontrol -p -c -d
And send the output to one of the DDCcontrol mailing lists (see ).
